title: Sierra LaMar // 180
description:
In March of 2012, a 15-year-old girl in California disappeared without a trace while walking to her bus stop early in the morning. Police had no idea where she could have gone until her cell phone and clothing was found, which painted the picture of a ruthless abduction. This is the story of Sierra LaMar.
BONUS EPISODES
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
